text_content: Search for email, meetings, files and more.

Make a rule around the selected email authors.
Reply all to this message. (Shift+R / Ctrl+Shift+R)
Mark this message as read or unread. (Ctrl+Q / Ctrl+U)
Categorize this item. Categories applied to a conversation will be applied to all current and future items in the conversation. (C)
Hide this message until a later time. (B)
Assign an archive or retention policy to automatically archive or delete the selected items.

text_content: Easy, direct connections that punch through NATs & stay connected as network conditions change.
In 2023 it's hard to connect two devices directly. Dumb pipe punches through NATs, using on-the-fly node identifiers. It even keeps your machines connected as network conditions change.
with that connection is up to you.
with a single command on two computers, connect them & pipe data from one machine to the other. No accounts. No configuration.
This will work, regardless of where the two machines are. Dumb pipe finds a way.
Dumb pipes are Iroh Connections. The

prev_screen_state.summary: The user is installing and configuring the Dumb Pipe tool to establish a secure, direct connection between two devices, using the website dumbpipe.dev for installation and setup.

screen_diff_markdown:
# Screen Text by Application

## Brave Browser (PID: 29176)

Dumb Pipe
Easy, direct connections that punch through NATs & stay connected as network conditions change.
Made by
Switch to
In 2023 it's hard to connect two devices directly. Dumb pipe punches through NATs, using on-the-fly node identifiers. It even keeps your machines connected as network conditions change.
What you actually
do
with that connection is up to you.
$ curl -sL https://www.dumbpipe.dev/install.sh | sh
get
dumbpipe
with a single command on two computers, connect them & pipe data from one machine to the other. No accounts. No configuration.
$ ./dumbpipe listen
using secret key 23ryys7pgvjrr57pcrvyivdrhvqyykg2tv3leou5grm66xfd7zzq
Listening. To connect, use:
./dumbpipe connect nodeecsxraxjtqtneathgplh6d5nb2rsnxpfulmkec2rvhwv3hh6m4rdgaibamaeqwjaegplgayaycueiom6wmbqcjqaibavg5hiaaaaaaaaaaabaau7wmbq
echo
"hello"
| ./dumbpipe connect nodeecsxraxjtqtneathgplh6d5nb2rsnxpfulmkec2rvhwv3hh6m4rdgaibamaeqwjaegplgayaycueiom6wmbqcjqaibavg5hiaaaaaaaaaaabaau7wmbq
This will work, regardless of where the two machines are. Dumb pipe finds a way.
Dumb pipes are Iroh Connections. The
tool is a
around the
